frame.name: Mental_activity
frame.definition: <def-root>In this frame, a <fen>Sentient_entity</fen> has some activity of the mind operating on a particular <fen>Content</fen> or about a particular <fen>Topic</fen>. The particular activity may be perceptual, emotional, or more generally cognitive. This non-lexical frame is intended primarily for inheritance.</def-root>

FE.name: Sentient_entity
FE.definition: <def-root>The individual whose mind has a particular piece of <fen>Content</fen> in it, or, more generically portrayed, whose mind is focussed on a particular <fen>Topic</fen>. </def-root>

FE.name: Content
FE.definition: <def-root>The situation or state-of-affairs that the <fen>Sentient_entity</fen>'s attention is focussed on. </def-root>

FE.name: Evidence
FE.definition: <def-root>The source of awareness or knowledge of the <fen>Content</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Topic
FE.definition: <def-root>A description of the kind of <fen>Content</fen> in the <fen>Sentient_entity</fen>'s attention in terms of an idea which is salient throughout the <fen>Content</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Degree</fen> to which an event occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>Any description of the cognitive act which is not covered by more specific FEs, including secondary effects (<ment>quietly, loudly</ment>), and general descriptions comparing events (<ment>the same way</ment>). In addition, it may indicate salient characteristics of a <fen>Sentient_entity</fen> that also affect the action (<ment>presumptuously, coldly, deliberately, eagerly, carefully</ment>). </def-root>

FE.name: Expressor
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Expressor</fen> is the body part that reveals the <fen>Sentient_entity</fen>'s state to the observer. </def-root>

FE.name: Role
FE.definition: <def-root>The category that an element of the <fen>Content</fen> is considered to belong to. </def-root>

FE.name: Paradigm
FE.definition:
<def-root>The system of knowledge which serves as the basis for the <fen>Sentient_entity</fen>'s awareness.
<ex><fex name="Content">The formation of black holes</fex> should be <t>understood</t> <fex name="Paradigm">in astrophysic terms</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The time interval during which the <fen>Sentient_entity</fen> has the <fen>Content</fen> in their attention.
</def-root>
